name: Possessor
description:
Possess your enemies & use their abilities! In Possessor you play as a cursed spirit that haunts a dungeon full of wizards, goblins, and demons! You have the ability to possess your enemies and use their abilities against them!

Features:

  • 2D Graphics with post-processing & real-time lighting.
  • 4 Different enemy types all with different stats.
  • 8 Levels.

How to play: 

  • Each level, you'll start with a specific amount of 'essence' & you'll have to kill all enemies in the level by taking control of them one-at-a-time and using their abilities against them. 
  • If the actor you're possessing dies and you don't have enough 'essence' left to possess any other actor, you'll lose the level and will have to restart. If you manage to kill an actor you'll gain their 'essence'.
  • Once you accumulate enough essence, you can make the current actor suicide to be able to control another one.
  • Once you manage to kill all other actors, you can make the actor you possess suicide to complete the level and progress to the next one!

Controls:

  • [W, A, S, D] to control the camera or the current possessed actor.
  • [Left Mouse Button] to select an actor for possession or to attack.
  • [Escape] to make the current possessed actor suicide.
  • [Spacebar] to show enemy positions, attack range, and remaining health.
